alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 3:01PM EDT until June 19 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Olympia Heights, or near South Miami, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Coral Gables, South Miami and Kendall. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
